DOC.brief_summary: This study will establish the bioequivalence of the 20%, milled, roller compaction final market image (FMI) etoricoxib tablets and 30% unmilled, roller compaction (UMC) etoricoxib tablets.
DOC.brief_title: Study of the Bioequivalence of the 20% and 30% Etoricoxib Tablet Formulations (0663-070)
DOC.criteria: Subject is in good health Subject agrees to follow the study guidelines Subject is a smoker Subject has a history of adverse reactions caused by NSAIDs or allergies/intolerance to NSAIDs Subject is in a situation or has a condition/disease which may interfere with optimal participation in the study
